scripts.typecheck: pnpm --dir apps/api typecheck && pnpm --dir packages/shared-types typecheck
scripts.madge:circular:report: madge --circular --extensions ts,tsx --exclude "(node_modules|\.next|dist|build|coverage|test-results|playwright-report|\.turbo)" --ts-config apps/web/tsconfig.json apps/web || true && madge --circular --extensions ts,tsx --exclude "(node_modules|\.next|dist|build|coverage|test-results|playwright-report|\.turbo)" --ts-config apps/api/tsconfig.json apps/api || true && madge --circular --extensions ts,tsx --exclude "(node_modules|\.next|dist|build|coverage|test-results|playwright-report|\.turbo)" --ts-config packages/shared-types/tsconfig.json packages/shared-types || true
